Desc.entry: Pentecostal church, which runs a lunch club for older people every Wednesday and a soup kitchen on Bank Holiday Mondays.

ContactName.entry: Snr Pastor Rev Delroy Hall, Minister

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Services 11am-1pm & 6.30-8pm, Sunday school at 10am (all ages), Wednesday night (prayer meeting/Bible study), Fri 7.30pm onwards (men's social group), other activities (please contact for details)
